title: An Act providing for the observance of election worker appreciation day

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Muradian of Grafton, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3394) of David K. Muradian, Jr., for the annual issuance by the Governor of a proclamation setting apart the Wednesday next after the first Monday in November in every even-numbered year as election worker appreciation day.  State Administration and Regulatory Oversight.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

related_entities.name: committee on State Administration and Regulatory Oversight

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/05/2025 from 10:30 AM-01:00 PM in A-2
Hearing rescheduled to 11/05/2025 from 10:30 AM-01:00 PM in B-2                                               and Virtual Hearing location changed
